author: tom
description:
Description: Collection of astronomy-related routinesHomepage URL: http://astlib.sourceforge.net/astLib is a set of Python modules that provides some tools for research
astronomers. It can be used for astronomical plots, some statistics,
common calculations, coordinate conversions, and manipulating FITS
images with World Coordinate System (WCS) information through
PyWCSTools - a simple wrapping of WCSTools by Doug Mink. PyWCSTools is distributed (and developed) as part of astLib.
title: astLib
